languages.text: "Когда-то я был частью рода пилотов {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Имперских рыцарей{/g}. Моим младшим сестрам очень нравились орнаменты с гербом нашего дома, которые красовались на корпусах этих могучих машин. Так что однажды ночью я украл резак и спилил герб помельче с рыцаря моего дядюшки".

"I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то я был частью рода пилотов {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Имперских рыцарей{/g}. Моим младшим сестрам очень нравились орнаменты с гербом нашего дома, которые красовались на корпусах этих могучих машин. Так что однажды ночью я украл резак и спилил герб помельче с рыцаря моего дядюшки".

traits.locale_text: "Once, I belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters were fond of the designs on the bodies of these mighty machines bearing our dynastic coat of arms. So one day I stole a cutter and cut off a smaller coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Once, I belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters were fond of the designs on the bodies of these mighty machines bearing our dynastic coat of arms. So one day I stole a cutter and cut off a smaller coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."

languages.text: « J'appartenais autrefois à une maison de pilotes de {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Chevaliers Impériaux{/g}. Mes sœurs cadettes désiraient un blason comme ceux qui ornaient le châssis de nos puissantes machines. Alors, un jour, j'ai volé une découpeuse et je m'en suis servi pour découper les armoiries du Chevalier de mon oncle. »
languages.original_text: "I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."

traits.locale_text: « J'appartenais autrefois à une maison de pilotes de {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Chevaliers Impériaux{/g}. Mes sœurs cadettes désiraient un blason comme ceux qui ornaient le châssis de nos puissantes machines. Alors, un jour, j'ai volé une découpeuse et je m'en suis servi pour découper les armoiries du Chevalier de mon oncle. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Pertenecía originalmente a una casa de pilotos de los {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Caballeros Imperiales{/g}. Mis hermanas pequeñas querían un blasón como los que adornaban el blindaje de nuestras poderosas máquinas, de modo que un día robé un cortador y lo usé para quitar el blasón del Caballero de mi tío».
languages.original_text: "I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."

traits.locale_text: «Pertenecía originalmente a una casa de pilotos de los {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Caballeros Imperiales{/g}. Mis hermanas pequeñas querían un blasón como los que adornaban el blindaje de nuestras poderosas máquinas, de modo que un día robé un cortador y lo usé para quitar el blasón del Caballero de mi tío».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我曾是贵族家族的一员，我的家族世代驾驶{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}帝国骑士{/g}。我的妹妹想要个纹章，就像那些坚不可摧的帝国骑士外壳上装饰的纹章那样。于是有一天，我偷走了一台等离子切割机，从我叔叔的帝国骑士上切掉了一个纹章。”
languages.original_text: "I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."

traits.locale_text: “我曾是贵族家族的一员，我的家族世代驾驶{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}帝国骑士{/g}。我的妹妹想要个纹章，就像那些坚不可摧的帝国骑士外壳上装饰的纹章那样。于是有一天，我偷走了一台等离子切割机，从我叔叔的帝国骑士上切掉了一个纹章。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「私はかつて{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}インペリアルナイト{/g}のパイロットの家に属していました。私の妹たちは、私たちの強力な機械の船体を飾る紋章のようなものを、欲しがっていました。ある日、私はカッターを盗み、それを使って叔父のナイトから紋章を持ち出したんです」
languages.original_text: "I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."

traits.locale_text: 「私はかつて{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}インペリアルナイト{/g}のパイロットの家に属していました。私の妹たちは、私たちの強力な機械の船体を飾る紋章のようなものを、欲しがっていました。ある日、私はカッターを盗み、それを使って叔父のナイトから紋章を持ち出したんです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich gehörte einst einem Haus von {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperialer-Ritter{/g}-Piloten an. Meine jüngeren Schwestern wollten ein Wappen wie jene, die auf dem Rumpf unserer mächtigen Maschinen prangten. Also stahl ich eines Tages einen Cutter und entfernte ein Wappen vom Ritter meines Onkels."
languages.original_text: "I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gehörte einst einem Haus von {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperialer-Ritter{/g}-Piloten an. Meine jüngeren Schwestern wollten ein Wappen wie jene, die auf dem Rumpf unserer mächtigen Maschinen prangten. Also stahl ich eines Tages einen Cutter und entfernte ein Wappen vom Ritter meines Onkels."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Eskiden bir {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}İmparatorluk Şövalyesi{/g} pilotu hanesindendim. Kız kardeşlerim, kudretli makinelerimizin gövdesine işlediklerimiz gibi bir arma istiyordu. Ben de bir gün kesici çaldım ve onunla amcamın Şövalyesinden arma kopardım."
languages.original_text: "I once belonged to a house of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialKnight}Imperial Knight{/g} pilots. My younger sisters wanted a coat of arms like the ones that adorned the hulls of our mighty machines. So one day, I stole a cutter, and used it to remove a coat of arms from my uncle's Knight."
